Class Pitch

Class representing a Pitch of a tone.

public class Pitch : IEquatable<Pitch>

Constructors

Pitch(int)

Class representing a Pitch of a tone.

public Pitch(int step)

Parameters

step int

step = 0 is middle C. step += 1 will increase the step by one semitone, so step = 1 will be middle C#.

Methods

GetFrequency()

double

GetHashCode()

Returns

int

A hash code for the current object.

ToString()

Returns a string representation of the Pitch.

public override string ToString()

Returns

string

A string representation of the Pitch, preferring flats over sharp, So C# would be displayed as Db

Operators

operator +(Pitch, AbsoluteInterval)

Get the pitch of this pitch plus an interval.

public static Pitch operator +(Pitch pitch, AbsoluteInterval interval)

Parameters

pitch Pitch

The pitch to start from.

interval AbsoluteInterval

How many steps up/down should be taken

Returns

Pitch

A new Pitch with the same step as input pitch, but offset by interval amount of semitones.
